name: Cheese and Leek
description:
(work on tablet or phone too (but better on pc))

Bug ! Sometimes the ingredient's box is empty, but that's not true, so watch the number on the box to know how many ingredients you got left.

🧀 Cheese and Leek 🥦

Cook by assembling the healthy and fresh ingredients with the not so healthy and fresh ingredients ! Find the perfect balance between the good greasy fried chicken and the perfect refreshing cauliflower, and make your customer, the happiest one !

For now, only Ema's Diner is open, but soon there will be two more restaurants.

🧀🧀🧀🥦🥦🥦

This is my participation for the WannaxYam Game Jam 2022 but also the MGDP game jam 2022 (started thinking about the game after the start of WannaxYam Game Jam with the two themes in mind)

Special thanks to Daphdaph, and Bogy for the playtesting, and Lea for finding the carrot mistake and the ingredients based on the shapes.

I am sorry Belgium, my home, for this ugly waffle. Hope you can forgive me.

  • Musics : A Lil Somethin' Somethin' and Evidence Song by the Good Lawdz
  • Sounds are all from Zapsplat (wonderful ressources)
  • Fonts : Child's Handwriting by TRMM2 and Bubbly by SamOnt

My twitter where you can send me your wonderful instagramable food pictures.
